scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin views/partials/footer.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/footer.ejs && usemin views/partials/header.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/header.ejs && usemin views/partials/playerHeader.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/playerHeader.ejs && usemin account.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/account.ejs && usemin accountError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/accountError.ejs && usemin checkout.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/checkout.ejs && usemin createAccountConformation.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/createAccountConformation.ejs && usemin download.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/download.ejs && usemin duplicateUsername.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/duplicateUsername.ejs && usemin login.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/login.ejs && usemin musicPlayer.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/musicPlayer.ejs && usemin nicknameError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/nicknameError.ejs && usemin passwordError.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/passwordError.ejs && usemin paymentSucceed.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/paymentSucceed.ejs && usemin retrieveCredentials.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/retrieveCredentials.ejs && usemin songUpload.ejs -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/songUpload.ejs
